Proximity_Encryption_Suite

Class File_Loading_Thread

  • java.lang.Object
    • Proximity_Encryption_Suite.File_Loading_Thread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class File_Loading_Thread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The File_Loading_Thread.Java Class implements an method to gather the related files a user whats to add or view on the system and gets there details for each in the background.
    Since:
    18-01-2014
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Harry Clewlow (C012952A)
